channel.title: Vampire faction Idea
channel.description:
I'm pretty sure there are plenty of vampire suggestion. or New Faction suggestion, but when we think about a new faction, what we need a faction that fonction in a different way then the existing factions So I came with Idea, this faction Ressemble the unseen, more then cult in the fact that it got a classes that can convert and classes that kill. hoverer it has unique traits 1 - All Vampires converts can kill at nights, which limit them in their ability to prove themselves. Hoverer, only 1 Vampire can kill at night, If the Vampire Mystic kill, the Vampire Servant cannot kill during this night 2 - Multiple vampires conversion will change their class type, making princess a much better tools in finding evils. 3 - this faction has mutliple members who possess the ability to frame others as vampires. This allow the prince to be converted, as the if the Vampire prince kill, no other vampire can kill this night Another particularity is all classes have a powerfull abilities can be used by consuming blood units, hoverer, blood units are very limited and are obtained by using killer abilities, except for the Court Wizard convert.
each game should at least have 1 healer, 1 vampire hunter, the Prince, the Vampire Master, 1 random vampire convert except (Vampire prince) and the King, also there cannot be a vampire Stalker and a Hunter at the same time or a Vampire Mystic and a Mystic at the same time. but the game can start with a Vampire stalker or a vampire mystic
So here are my classes, Feel free to give some feed back or some idea. for no, I would say the maximum for vampires should be 3 or 4. if we keep the limited kill in place, the maximum should be 4, but if the kill were n ot limited, like the unseen, it should be 3, including the vampire masters.
[details="Vampire Counter Classes"] > # :crossed_swords: [color=Blue]Vampire Hunter[/color] > **[color=Blue]Blue Dragon Investigaive[/color]** **Determined (Passive)** - Immune to occupation **Holy Cross (Day)** - You will become immune to conversion tonight. - 3 uses **Holy Water (Day)** - You will become immune to Frames tonight. - 3 uses **Examination (Night)** - Determine if a player is a vampire or not - x uses **Stake (Night)** - Invest and Attack a players, if they appears as a vampire you will attack them- 3 uses Defeat the Vampires and any neutrals that seek to do you harm. [/details]
Vampire Classes
[details="Summary"] > #:shield: :crossed_swords: [color=Orange]Vampire Master[/color] > **[color=Orange]Vampire Special[/color]** ** Awareness (Passive)** - Immune to death, occupy and redirection are night. You start with 1 Blood Unit ** In the Dark (Passive)** - You will not be attacked by a Vampire Hunter. ** Blood injection (Day)** - Consumme 3 blood units to ensure your next bite attempt, bypass conversion immunity, you can only convert Blue Dragon targets - Infinite uses ** Flu (Day)** - Cause a player to become sick, they will die in 2 days unless healed - Infinite uses ** Turning Bite (Night)** - Attempt to transform a player into a vampire. Give 1 blood units per bite. - Infinite uses (1 day cooldown upon success) ** Refreshing Bite (Night)** - Bite a player, cause them to believe they were attacked and healed, you will gain 1 blood unit per use. They- 4 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm. Note, if the Vampire Master Dies before day 4, he will be remplaced by the oldest vampire member alive
> # [color=Orange] Vampire Servant[/color] (Converted from The Butler) > **[color=Orange] Vampire Offensive[/color]** **Dutyfull (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. You will keep this passive even if your class changes. **Don't check me (Passive)** - Attacking investigative class will grant 1 extra blood unit. ** Bewilder (Day)** - Disabled the king's abilities for the Day. - 1 uses ** Frame (Day)** - Consume 3 Blood units, the players you target with Serve Wine will appear as a vampire for the rest of the game. - Infinite uses **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player. - Infinite uses **Fatal Wine (Night)** - Occupy and kill a player, grant 1 blood unit per succesful use. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Wizard[/color] (Converted from The Court Wizard) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Special[/color]** ** Magic Vampire (Passive)** - Attacking a Magic User, will grant 2 extra blood Units ** Magic explosion (Day)** - Consume 6 Blood units, allowing you to kill all players who would visit a target of your choice, tonight, bypass death, cannot be healed . - Infinites uses ** Siphon (Day)** - DAY ABILITY. Steal power from a player for one night, you will learn their class type, grand 1 Blood unit per succesful use, you can't target the same player twice. Offensive = Occupy immunity, Killer = Death immunity, Investigative = Guarenteed visits, Support Class = 1 Extra blood Unit, Social Class = Astral Visit ** Blood Tornado (Night)** - NIGHT ABILITY. Cause all players targeting one of your targets to target the other- Infinite uses ** Magic Bite (Night)** - Kill a player, grant 1 blood unit per succesful use. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Drunk[/color] (Converted from The Drunk) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Investigative[/color]** ** Royal Blood(Passive)** - During election for a new king, votes for you count double. ** I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. You will keep this passive even if your class changes. ** Blood Drink (Day)** - Consume 1 unit to allow your next debauchery to occupy your target and remove their night and occupy immunity for the night. - Infinite uses ** Debauchery (Night)** - redirect a player toward a target of your choice and limit their class to two types - Infinite uses ** Fatal Drink (Night)** - Cause a player to target you and attack them, will grant 1 extra Blood units per use. - 3 uses *GOAL.*
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Stalker[/color] (Converted from The Hunter) > **[color=Orange]Vampire investigative[/color]** **Isolation (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. You will keep this passive even if your class changes. **Hungry for killer (Passive)** - Attacking a killer class will grant 1 extra blood unit **Mind Read(Day)** - Consumme 2 blood units to learn a player exact class. - Infinite uses **Stalk (Night)** - Follow a players and learn their class type. - Infinite uses **Woodman's Bite (Night)** - Attack a player, does not count as a visit, grain 1 blood unit per succesful use- 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Guard[/color] (Converted from The Knight) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Support[/color]** **Defender (Passive)** - Attacking a killer class will grant 1 extra blood unit **Blood Armor (Day)** - Consume 2 blood units to become immune to death tonight. - Infinite uses **Protection (Night)** - Protection a vampire, making them death immune and prevent all abilities targeting them. - 3 uses **Vampiric Steel (Night)** - Kill a player. - 3 uses *GOAL.*
> [color=Orange]Vampire Mystic[/color] (Converted from The Mystic) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Social[/color]** ** Cute Girl (Passive)** - you will appear as a member of the Blue Dragon ** Drinks hater(Passive)** - Immune to occupation, does not appear as occupy immune to other players, Attacking an offensive class will grant 1 extra blood unit **Telepathy (Day)** - Telepathically Send a message to everyone, they will not know who sent it. - 2 uses **Blood Confusion (Day)** - Consumme 1 Blood unit, to cause a player to receive incorrect feedback from their abilities - Infinite uses **Link Minds** - Allows another player to talk to you tonight. - Infinite uses **Ambush (Night)** - Kill the player you linked tonight, does not count as a visit, grant 1 blood unit per successful use. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Noble[/color] (Converted from The Noble) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Social[/color]** ** Royal Blood(Passive)** - During election for a new king, votes for you count double. ** Worried (Passive)** - Killing investigative class will grant 1 extra blood unit. ** Blood Pressure (Day)** - Force a player to vote for another and prevent further voting from them. - 2 uses ** Blood Spy (Day)** - Consumme 2 blood units, allowing you to spy on court for two days ** Blood Intrigue (Night)** - Frame a player and receive the Feedback of abilities used of them. - x uses ** Deadly Maid (Night)** - Send a maid to kill a player, does not count a visit, grant 1 blood unit per succesful uses. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Watcher[/color] (Converted from The Observer) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Investigative[/color]** ** Informant (Passive)** - Attacking an Offensive or Support class will grant 1 extra blood unit ** Discover (Day)** - Consume 2 Blood to learn the target's exact class. - Infinite uses ** Follow (Night)** - Discover who a player targets, and who targets them. - Infinite uses ** Silent Kill (Night)** - Kill a player, does not count as a visit, grant 1 blood unit per succesful use. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Doctor[/color] (Converted from the Physician) > **[color=Orange]Vampire offensive[/color]** **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - Immune to Nightshade, Bleeding and sickness. **Security (Passive)** - Attacking Support or social classes will grant 1 extra blood unit. ** Defile (Day)** - Consume 2 Blood units to desguise a player, if they dies they will appear as the choosen class. - Infinite uses ** Exhume (Day)** - at the end of the knight, you will learn what classes killed a player, or if they committed suicide ** Heal (Night)** - Visit a vampire, healing their Wound and cure any poison or sickness - Infinite uses ** Surgery (Night)** - Kill a player, cannot be healed, grant 1 blood unit per uses. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # :shield: [color=Orange]Vampire Prince[/color] (Converted from The Prince) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Social[/color]** **Unstoppable (Passive)** - Cannot be occupied or redirected. **Royal Hunger(Passive)** - Executing a player with Royal Blood will grant 1 extra blood units. **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a player to jail tonight. - Infinite uses **Frame (Day)** - Consume 1 blood to frame a player, they will appear as a vampire, tonight. - Infinite uses ** Vampiric execution(Night)** - Kill the jailed player, bypass death immunity, grand 1 blood unit per successful use. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Lady[/color] (Converted from The Princess) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Support[/color]** ** Royal Blood(Passive)** - During election for a new king, votes for you count double. ** Healthy Hunger (Passive)** - Attacking a social or support classes will grant 1 extra blood unit. ** Blood Shield (Day)** - Consumme 1 blood unit to make a vampire appears as members of the Blue Dragon tonight. - Infinite uses ** Support (Night)** - Guarantees that another vampire will visit their target - 3 uses ** Bite (Night)** - Killer a player, grant 1 blood unit per successful uses - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
> # [color=Orange]Vampire Enforcer[/color] (Converted from The Vampire Hunter) > **[color=Orange]Vampire Social[/color]** **Vampiric Resolve(Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection **Hunter's reputation** - You will appear as a member of the Blue Dragon to the investigative classes. **Troll Box (Day)** - Make it look like a player say something. They will not see the message. - Infinite uses **Dark Void (Day)** - Consumme 1 Blood Unit to make yourself immune to death tonight. - Infinite uses **Frame (Night)** - Frame a player. - Infinite uses **Dark Stake (Night)** - Kill a player, can't be healed, grant 1 extra blood unit per succesful use. - 3 uses *GOAL.* Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm. [/details]
How the classes work Vampire Hunter Unlike paladin and Sheriff, this class as no tool to fight conversion, they can only prevent their own conversion into a vampire, they are immune to occupation, but not to redirection. Holy cross will protect you from conversion, but not if the vampire choose to bipass your immunity. Holy Water will prevent you from seeing a framed player as a vampire or attacking a framed player, but it will not allow you to find the Vampire master, Vampire Mystic or a Vampire Enforcer. Using Stake on a blue dragon framed as vampire will result in the death of the blue dragon.
Vampire Master The mastermind of the vampires, with the ability to pass as a phys for some times, the player should gain 1 blood unit when they use refreshing bite and 1 each time they are able to convert someone.
Vampire Servant The Vampire Servant frame will stay on the player for the entire game. So if a mystic is framed and converted, She'Ll be seen as vampires despite her having the ability to appears as non-suspicious
vampire wizard This is a powerfull class. trueits Magic Explosion will kill everyone who visit a single during the day, its like a circle of death, hoverer, it is very expensive in term of blood units.
Vampire drunk If you use blood drink, you will not able to redirect's a player's target with Debauchery,
vampire Stalker Mind read allow you to learn a player's exact, while Stalk only allow you to learn their class type.
Vampire Guard this is exactly like enforcer.
Vampire mystic Blood confusion will make a vampire appears as non-suspicious and a blue dragon appear as vampires, but will be stopped by holy water, as it an ability that frame the Mystic abilities do not target people, so they can't be redirected. The vampire Mystic cannot use private matters.
Vampire noble Hole Water will stop Blood Intrigue from framing a players. the vampire noble can use all abilities of a noble except noble twin<
Vampire watcher A converted observer will not be seen by an other observer to visit the target he attack.
Vampire Doctor Surgery cannot be healed, but it can be stopped by a Mercenary's shield, King's Guard or a Knight's defend.
Vampire prince the prince actually lose royal blood, but this is not needed since he never step up,
Vampire Lady Holy water will have no effect on Blood Shield, for it is a frame.
vampire enforcer This class work like a Scorned,

item.title: Vampire faction Idea
item.dc:creator: Audreyaloy
item.description:
Alright,
I made some modification to Vampire hunter, Vampire Stalker, Vampire master and vampire Enforcer…

but I still think I am a long to say before completing any faction of any kind
but just saying, I reworked the idea. and I’ll develop it

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire faction Idea
item.dc:creator: Audreyaloy
item.description:
Well, I’Ll try to think on answer later, I got all roles saved on a note pad document

ON Vampires Hunter, its truth that it ressemble the Inquisitor with additional powers,
Might be a good idea to remove Stake, as investigative don’t kill and its can be tricked, for exemple, a stake will never kill the Vampire Master, converted mystic or converted vampire hunter (except if framed by a scorned)
Immunity to occupy is mean to compensate the fact that it cannot fight agaisnt conversion, unlike the Sheriff or the Paladin, no scout, no smite.

Vampire Master, I may change Blood Injection, but only the Inq and the possessor are threatened by this abilities, Reaper will survive and you have no business killing the Sorc
Phys claim are already suspicious

Yeah Vampire Enforcer, right now just screw poss,

Yeah Vampire Wizard has a strong ability to kill all visitors, does not gain death immunity from this and it need at least 3 nights to prepare it. As to gain extra blood, your target are minimal.

Vampire Stalker is the hunter, I though such a power was needed to the hunter to keep his claim alive. can’t wolf anymore,

Vampire Guard was intented to be similar to enforcer. it protected its vampire friends

Well Vampire mystic was intented since She need Link mind to confirm herself, because she cannot use private whispers anymore. so Link minds is needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire faction Idea
item.dc:creator: Scath
item.description:
I WOULD LIKE TO SAY THAT I MAY OR MAY NOT HAVE BEEN TOO SERIOUS HERE AND REMEMBER THAT THIS IS MY OPINION AKA I MIGHT BE WRONG ON SOME OF THESE

also wall of text and what’s the cap on members?

  • Blood Points idea pretty good but the abilities are kinda op seeing how easy it is to get blood points imo
Audreyaloy:

Vampire Hunter

Blue Dragon Investigaive
Determined (Passive) - Immune to occupation
Holy Cross (Day) - You will become immune to conversion tonight. - 3 uses
Holy Water (Day) - You will become immune to death tonight. - 3 uses
Examination (Night) - Determine if a player is a vampire or not - x uses
Stake (Night) - Invest and Attack a players, if they appears as a vampire you will attack them- 3 uses
Defeat the Vampires and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

As soon as I saw the ability Stake I knew that this was copying Vampire/Vampire Hunter from Town of Salem. (Also the fact that any vampire can kill but only one can per night)

If you are going to keep stake, make it one use, not three. (I’d remove it though) Investigatives don’t kill.

Just remove Holy Water entirely. It’s unbalanced in the fact that you can just use it to survive a vampire attack in the endgame and then stake that night. Besides, you don’t need to survive to win.

Immune to occupation? I mean, it’s fine, I guess?

Reduce Holy Cross to 1 or 2 uses, 3 is too much since you can just use them all on convert nights and never get converted.

I would review the other converts but that’d take too long and it’d make the post too big so I’ll just review the Vampire Master.

Audreyaloy:

# Vampire Master
Vampire Special
** Awareness (Passive)** - Immune to death, occupy and redirection are night. You start with 1 Blood Unit
** In the Dark (Passive)** - You will not be attacked by a Vampire Hunter.
** Blood injection (Day)** - Consumme 3 blood units to ensure your next bite attempt, bypass conversion immunity, if your target was Neutral you will kill them, bypassing death immunity and healing- Infinite uses
** Flu (Day)** - Cause a player to become sick, they will die in 2 days unless healed - Infinite uses
** Turning Bite (Night)** - Attempt to transform a player into a vampire. Give 1 blood units per bite. - Infinite uses (1 day cooldown upon success)
** Refreshing Bite (Night)** - Bite a player, cause them to believe they were attacked and healed, you will gain 1 blood unit per use. They- 4 uses
GOAL. Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
Note, if the Vampire Master Dies before day 4, he will be remplaced by the oldest vampire member alive

-Passives are fine
-Blood Injection is way too overpowered since you can use it to kill NK.
-Flu + Night Abilities are fine, but Phys claims would obviously become more suspiscious.

I would like to say that the conversions are way too overpowered and that Prince shouldn’t be convertable.

-Prince convert itself is just way too overpowered for the Vampires
-Vampire Enforcer’s Dark Stake and Dark Void are also overpowered, since they can survive and kill the Neutral Killer.
-Vampire Servant is Fine
-Vampire Wizard kinda taken from CW Rework thing, kinda op?
-Vampire Drunk should not combine Drunk and Princess into one class. Other than that, it’s fine.
-Vampire Stalker shouldn’t be able to bypass death immunity, Mind Read is eh, Stalk is Duchess and Observer combined
-Vampire Guard is kinda op since Protection gives death immunity
-Vampire Mystic is MM and Mystic and Illusionist Combined, minus the death immunity and conversion ability (op)
-Vampire Noble is fine
-Vampire Doctor and Watcher are fine
-Vampire Lady is fine

[endreviewthing]

I took this way too seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire faction Idea
item.dc:creator: Audreyaloy
item.description:
You are talking about the Vampire master Ability to use up 3 blood units to attack the nk or other vampires ?
cause If I count, this ability came from converted Hunter, converted prince (who cannot jail king), convert vampire hunter (that one, I might give, might be too much)

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire faction Idea
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
But you basically made being a neutral killer a nightmare.

And + the fact that you give a hard counter death immunity

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire faction Idea
item.dc:creator: Audreyaloy
item.description:
Yeah, but its not that simple to convert the prince, you need to pay Blood Units and considering length of the game, no way the Vampire master will be use his strong bite more then 2, Also if you happen to miss your chance because of Merc / Drunk hh, Bye bye your blood units, because of this, the prince can only be converted night 4.

The vampire hunter can be converted, Yes they have the advantage of Death immunity, but there are some vampires class they cannot kill / detect, and if they get mind warped, framed, they may endup killing innocent Blue dragons. Some Bd might want to execute any Vampire Hunter claims

And actually here the vampires Could want to use some claims to their advantages,
the vampire prince is the best exemple, he will want to execute any royal claims so strenghen himself, after a normal execution he can frame 1 person, but if its royal, he’ll be able to use twice.

Also, if you guys check, you will see that the vampires killer abilities are limited with no way to remplish them. at least they can all kill.

Read full topic

I guess but do princes ever do that anymore

Getting it since Prince under certain circumstances can be converted…
It’s a good thing as it’d discourage mass claims

item.title: Vampire faction Idea
item.dc:creator: Audreyaloy
item.description:
I’m pretty sure there are plenty of vampire suggestion. or New Faction suggestion, but when we think about a new faction, what we need a faction that fonction in a different way then the existing factions
So I came with Idea, this faction Ressemble the unseen, more then cult in the fact that it got a classes that can convert and classes that kill. hoverer it has unique traits
1 - All Vampires converts can kill at nights, which limit them in their ability to prove themselves. Hoverer, only 1 Vampire can kill at night, If the Vampire Mystic kill, the Vampire Servant cannot kill during this night
2 - Multiple vampires conversion will change their class type, making princess a much better tools in finding evils.
3 - this faction has mutliple members who possess the ability to frame others as vampires.
This allow the prince to be converted, as the if the Vampire prince kill, no other vampire can kill this night
Another particularity is all classes have a powerfull abilities can be used by consuming blood units, hoverer, blood units are very limited and are obtained by using killer abilities, except for the Court Wizard convert.

each game should at least have 1 healer, 1 vampire hunter, the Prince, the Vampire Master, 1 random vampire convert except (Vampire prince) and the King, also there cannot be a vampire Stalker and a Hunter at the same time or a Vampire Mystic and a Mystic at the same time. but the game can start with a Vampire stalker or a vampire mystic

So here are my classes, Feel free to give some feed back or some idea. for no, I would say the maximum for vampires should be 3 or 4. if we keep the limited kill in place, the maximum should be 4, but if the kill were n ot limited, like the unseen, it should be 3, including the vampire masters.

Vampire Counter Classes

Vampire Hunter

Blue Dragon Investigaive
Determined (Passive) - Immune to occupation
Holy Cross (Day) - You will become immune to conversion tonight. - 3 uses
Holy Water (Day) - You will become immune to Frames tonight. - 3 uses
Examination (Night) - Determine if a player is a vampire or not - x uses
Stake (Night) - Invest and Attack a players, if they appears as a vampire you will attack them- 3 uses
Defeat the Vampires and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Vampire Classes

Summary

# Vampire Master
Vampire Special
** Awareness (Passive)** - Immune to death, occupy and redirection are night. You start with 1 Blood Unit
** In the Dark (Passive)** - You will not be attacked by a Vampire Hunter.
** Blood injection (Day)** - Consumme 3 blood units to ensure your next bite attempt, bypass conversion immunity, you can only convert Blue Dragon targets - Infinite uses
** Flu (Day)** - Cause a player to become sick, they will die in 2 days unless healed - Infinite uses
** Turning Bite (Night)** - Attempt to transform a player into a vampire. Give 1 blood units per bite. - Infinite uses (1 day cooldown upon success)
** Refreshing Bite (Night)** - Bite a player, cause them to believe they were attacked and healed, you will gain 1 blood unit per use. They- 4 uses
GOAL. Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.
Note, if the Vampire Master Dies before day 4, he will be remplaced by the oldest vampire member alive

Vampire Servant (Converted from The Butler)

Vampire Offensive
Dutyfull (Passive) - Immune to occupation and redirection. You will keep this passive even if your class changes.
Don’t check me (Passive) - Attacking investigative class will grant 1 extra blood unit.
** Bewilder (Day)** - Disabled the king’s abilities for the Day. - 1 uses
** Frame (Day)** - Consume 3 Blood units, the players you target with Serve Wine will appear as a vampire for the rest of the game. - Infinite uses
Serve Wine (Night) - Occupy a player. - Infinite uses
Fatal Wine (Night) - Occupy and kill a player, grant 1 blood unit per succesful use. - 3 uses
GOAL. Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.

Vampire Wizard (Converted from The Court Wizard)

Vampire Special
** Magic Vampire (Passive)** - Attacking a Magic User, will grant 2 extra blood Units
** Magic explosion (Day)** - Consume 6 Blood units, allowing you to kill all players who would visit a target of your choice, tonight, bypass death, cannot be healed . - Infinites uses
** Siphon (Day)** - DAY ABILITY. Steal power from a player for one night, you will learn their class type, grand 1 Blood unit per succesful use, you can’t target the same player twice.
Offensive = Occupy immunity, Killer = Death immunity, Investigative = Guarenteed visits, Support Class = 1 Extra blood Unit, Social Class = Astral Visit
** Blood Tornado (Night)** - NIGHT ABILITY. Cause all players targeting one of your targets to target the other- Infinite uses
** Magic Bite (Night)** - Kill a player, grant 1 blood unit per succesful use. - 3 uses
GOAL. Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.

Vampire Drunk (Converted from The Drunk)

Vampire Investigative
** Royal Blood(Passive)** - During election for a new king, votes for you count double.
** I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. You will keep this passive even if your class changes.
** Blood Drink (Day)** - Consume 1 unit to allow your next debauchery to occupy your target and remove their night and occupy immunity for the night. - Infinite uses
** Debauchery (Night)** - redirect a player toward a target of your choice and limit their class to two types - Infinite uses
** Fatal Drink (Night)** - Cause a player to target you and attack them, will grant 1 extra Blood units per use. - 3 uses
GOAL.

Vampire Stalker (Converted from The Hunter)

Vampire investigative
Isolation (Passive) - Immune to occupation and redirection. You will keep this passive even if your class changes.
Hungry for killer (Passive) - Attacking a killer class will grant 1 extra blood unit
Mind Read(Day) - Consumme 2 blood units to learn a player exact class. - Infinite uses
Stalk (Night) - Follow a players and learn their class type. - Infinite uses
Woodman’s Bite (Night) - Attack a player, does not count as a visit, grain 1 blood unit per succesful use- 3 uses
GOAL. Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.

Vampire Guard (Converted from The Knight)

Vampire Support
Defender (Passive) - Attacking a killer class will grant 1 extra blood unit
Blood Armor (Day) - Consume 2 blood units to become immune to death tonight. - Infinite uses
Protection (Night) - Protection a vampire, making them death immune and prevent all abilities targeting them. - 3 uses
Vampiric Steel (Night) - Kill a player. - 3 uses
GOAL.

Vampire Mystic (Converted from The Mystic)
Vampire Social
** Cute Girl (Passive)** - you will appear as a member of the Blue Dragon
** Drinks hater(Passive)** - Immune to occupation, does not appear as occupy immune to other players, Attacking an offensive class will grant 1 extra blood unit
Telepathy (Day) - Telepathically Send a message to everyone, they will not know who sent it. - 2 uses
Blood Confusion (Day) - Consumme 1 Blood unit, to cause a player to receive incorrect feedback from their abilities - Infinite uses
Link Minds - Allows another player to talk to you tonight. - Infinite uses
Ambush (Night) - Kill the player you linked tonight, does not count as a visit, grant 1 blood unit per successful use. - 3 uses
GOAL. Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.

Vampire Noble (Converted from The Noble)

Vampire Social
** Royal Blood(Passive)** - During election for a new king, votes for you count double.
** Worried (Passive)** - Killing investigative class will grant 1 extra blood unit.
** Blood Pressure (Day)** - Force a player to vote for another and prevent further voting from them. - 2 uses
** Blood Spy (Day)** - Consumme 2 blood units, allowing you to spy on court for two days
** Blood Intrigue (Night)** - Frame a player and receive the Feedback of abilities used of them. - x uses
** Deadly Maid (Night)** - Send a maid to kill a player, does not count a visit, grant 1 blood unit per succesful uses. - 3 uses
GOAL. Defeat the Blue Dragon, along with any Neutral that seek to do you harm.

How the classes work
Vampire Hunter
Unlike paladin and Sheriff, this class as no tool to fight conversion, they can only prevent their own conversion into a vampire, they are immune to occupation, but not to redirection.
Holy cross will protect you from conversion, but not if the vampire choose to bipass your immunity.
Holy Water will prevent you from seeing a framed player as a vampire or attacking a framed player, but it will not allow you to find the Vampire master, Vampire Mystic or a Vampire
Enforcer.
Using Stake on a blue dragon framed as vampire will result in the death of the blue dragon.

Vampire Master
The mastermind of the vampires, with the ability to pass as a phys for some times,
the player should gain 1 blood unit when they use refreshing bite and 1 each time they are able to convert someone.

Vampire Servant
The Vampire Servant frame will stay on the player for the entire game. So if a mystic is framed and converted, She’Ll be seen as vampires despite her having the ability to appears as non-suspicious

vampire wizard
This is a powerfull class. trueits Magic Explosion will kill everyone who visit a single during the day, its like a circle of death, hoverer, it is very expensive in term of blood units.

Vampire drunk
If you use blood drink, you will not able to redirect’s a player’s target with Debauchery,

vampire Stalker
Mind read allow you to learn a player’s exact, while Stalk only allow you to learn their class type.

Vampire Guard
this is exactly like enforcer.

Vampire mystic
Blood confusion will make a vampire appears as non-suspicious and a blue dragon appear as vampires, but will be stopped by holy water, as it an ability that frame
the Mystic abilities do not target people, so they can’t be redirected.
The vampire Mystic cannot use private matters.

Vampire noble
Hole Water will stop Blood Intrigue from framing a players.
the vampire noble can use all abilities of a noble except noble twin<

Vampire watcher
A converted observer will not be seen by an other observer to visit the target he attack.

Vampire Doctor
Surgery cannot be healed, but it can be stopped by a Mercenary’s shield, King’s Guard or a Knight’s defend.

Vampire prince
the prince actually lose royal blood, but this is not needed since he never step up,

Vampire Lady
Holy water will have no effect on Blood Shield, for it is a frame.

vampire enforcer
This class work like a Scorned,
